features: ONE TOOL TO RULE THEM ALL - You won't need strainers or boilers anymore. Our microwavable cookware is the only thing you'll need to whip up a bowl of your favorite mac and cheese. Less stress, right?
EASY PEASY COOKING - Enjoy hassle-free cooking with our microwave safe cookware -- just put your mac and cheese in the container and let the microwave do ALL the work.
REHEAT AND EAT - Have some mac and cheese in the fridge? Don't worry about wasting it because our Rapid Mac Cooker is perfect for reheating leftovers.
SIMPLE CLEAN UP - Don't have the time or energy to do the dishes? Don't worry--- our Rapid Mac Cooker is completely dishwasher safe. Cleaning up after a quick meal has never been this easy!

PERFECT FOR THE PERSON ON THE GO - Only have a few minutes to spare for a meal? Our mac and cheese bowl is perfect for when you're short on time and craving pasta. This tool is ideal for busy parents, college students, or office workers.
body.description: Say hello to hassle free meals with our microwave safe cookware! For people with a fast-paced lifestyle, it's common to skip meals because they lack time or energy. But what if you can make a complete meal with just your microwave? That's what our microwave cookers are for--- we value your time and we want you to stay healthy without worries. If you're always craving mac and cheese but don't have the time to use pots or strainers, our mac and cheese bowl is the perfect tool for you! This microwavable cookware is ideal for the student living in a dorm or employees working in an office. This is a go-to tool for when you're looking to squeeze in a meal in between classes or tasks. This bowl is also great for small kitchens with a shortage of shelf space. You won't need a lot of other plates when you've got your own cookware you can cook on and eat off. This microwave cooking bowl is also very easy to clean. Our Rapid Mac Cooker is completely dishwasher safe so you can leave it in the dishwasher when you don't have the time or energy to clean up. Convenience at its best, right? Don't miss out on great meals just because you're busy. Get your own Rapid Mac Cooker now and enjoy easy-peasy meals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great microwave bowl
reviews.reviewText: So i got this bowl from wallyworld when i was about to move away for college. I’m now 6 years out of school, so i’ve had this thing for almost a decade. It’s nothing special, it is a bowl that you can microwave food in. Works great for what it is. I just have to say how it looks after i’ve microwaved it and run it through the dishwasher hundreds of times makes it worth buying for anyone that uses their microwave regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievably awesome bowl!
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't say verified purchase because my sister bought it for me three years ago. I was using cheap Rubbermaid bowl that I kept having to replace, and she bought me this bowl so I'd stop wasting the money. At first I was annoyed, but I quickly changed my mind. First, because I was able to cook Mac & Cheese in the microwave and it turn out good! But then because of how durable and cleanable it is. As I've said, I've had it over three years, but it still looks as good as the day I got it. I've used it for literally everything, like Mac & Cheese, ramen, spaghetti, ice cream, you name it. Not even the sauce from ravioli stained! Today, I made spaghetti and decided to take three photos. One with the spaghetti in the bowl, one after the spaghetti was gone showing how dirty it was, and one after I cleaned it. None of the spaghetti sauce stained! It's seriously amazing to me what this bowl has been through and still come out looking clean. lol Honestly never thought I'd ever be reviewing a bowl!
